definition: the relative speed of progress or change, assign a rank or rating to
details:
noun
- the relative speed of progress or change
= synonyms: pace
- amount of a charge or payment relative to some basis
= example: amount of a charge or payment relative to some basis
= synonyms: charge per unit
- a quantity or amount or measure considered as a proportion of another quantity or amount or measure
= example: a quantity or amount or measure considered as a proportion of another quantity or amount or measure
- a magnitude or frequency relative to a time unit
= example: a magnitude or frequency relative to a time unit
verb
- assign a rank or rating to
= synonyms: place
- estimate the value of
= example: estimate the value of
= synonyms: value
- be worthy of or have a certain rating
= example: be worthy of or have a certain rating
